meta.title: Custom Software Solutions For Educational Institutions
meta.description: This is Codex Software landing page

title: Custom Software Solutions
For Educators and Students
welcome.subtitle: We help schools, institutions, eLearning and EdTech companies streamline and manage educational process.

articleWithImageAndText.title: Services
articleWithImageAndText.text: We develop software and provide development teams for companies and institutions shaping the future of education

textBoxes.title: Software MVP Development
textBoxes.subtitle: Bring the app to market as fast as possible
textBoxes.text: A team of skilled UX experts, product engineers, and business analysts will help you prototype, test, and validate your ideas quickly and efficiently.

textBoxes.title: Software Product Evolution
textBoxes.subtitle: Enhance and extend your product at any stage
textBoxes.text: Hire a full-service engineering team to improve design, usability, performance, scalability and security of an existing software product, or add new product features.

textBoxes.title: Software Modernisation
textBoxes.subtitle: Revitalise your legacy systems
textBoxes.text: Receive full range of services to turn outdated software into a modern solution with a better user experience, lower maintenance costs, and extended functionality.

articleWithImageAndText2.title: Solutions
articleWithImageAndText2.text: We plan, build and evolve modern applications to streamline, manage and innovate education.

textBoxes.title: eLearning Platforms
textBoxes.subtitle: Streamline remote education for teachers and learners

textBoxes.title: LMS Platforms
textBoxes.subtitle: Manage educational institutions of any size, effectively

textBoxes.title: AI for Education
textBoxes.subtitle: Use the latest AI technologies to streamline educational activities

textBoxes.title: Data Analytics & Visualisation
textBoxes.subtitle: Gather, process and visualise data to maximise efficiency of teaching

imageArticle.title: Need a custom software solution?
imageArticle.subtitle: Send us a request. We'll be glad to help you:
list: Refine, document, analyse and assess your requirements
Staff your team with Software Developers, Data Scientists, Business Analysts
Save up to 40% of costs if compared to running an in-house team

imageBoxes.title: Universite Paris-Dauphine
imageBoxes.description: We assisted Université Paris-Dauphine in building a software solution for managing student groups at a university.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “They always delivered what was promised. They not only stuck to their commitments but also quickly allocated additional resources when it was necessary. They're results-oriented and proactive, and I haven’t met many companies with such an approach before.”

imageBoxes.title: EnglishCo
imageBoxes.description: We assisted the Customer to develop a comprehensive eLearning platform for English language students, designed to offer personalized online teaching programs led live by American teachers.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Codex helped us a lot with the tasks, and I can always count on them.”

messageInput.label: Message
messageInput.placeholder: Share your requirements, ask a question, or request a free consultation
